snippet: The intensification of the attacks, including a suicide bombing on Tuesday, began less than a week after Nigeria’s new president vowed to crush the group.
abstract: Boko Haram has intensified its attacks in northeast Nigeria, killing scores of people in assaults and suicide bombings; country's Pres Muhammadu Buhari has sworn to destroy group.
lead_paragraph: The intensification of the attacks, including a suicide bombing on Tuesday, began less than a week after Nigeria’s new president vowed to crush the group.

headline.main: Boko Haram Steps Up Attacks in Northeast Nigeria, Killing Scores
headline.print_headline: Boko Haram Kills Scores in Northeast of Nigeria
